text.jpText: Light up! 未来へとKIRAめけ イルミネイション
text.enText: Light up! The future with a sparkling illumination

text.jpText: さあ 飾りはあと笑顔だけ
text.enText: Now, the only decoration left is a smile

text.jpText: Let's party all night!
text.enText: Let's party all night!

text.jpText: （Happy together）
text.enText: (Happy together)

text.jpText: （Happy together）
text.enText: (Happy together)

text.jpText: （Oh yeah! I wish a Merry Christmas!）
text.enText: (Oh yeah! I wish a Merry Christmas!)

text.jpText: 満天の空にさえ 勝てるような
text.enText: I feel just like I could win against that starry sky

text.jpText: 一瞬を創ってみようよ Are you ready?
text.enText: How about we try to create that very moment? Are you ready?

text.jpText: ちょっとずつ アイディアを繋げて ミルキーウェイ
text.enText: Bit by bit, By connecting these ideas just like the Milky Way

text.jpText: Yes! 見たことない景色 あらわれそう
text.enText: Yes! Seems like a never before seen spectacle will unfold

text.jpText: Ding dong 今年を彩るように 咲いてく
text.enText: Ding dong, This year the colors are just now beginning to bloom

text.jpText: Ding dong 夢の[点灯]<ライト> ファンファーレにして
text.enText: Ding dong, The Light of a dream turns in to a fanfare

text.jpText: 始めようよ Shiny time!
text.enText: Let's get this started, it's Shiny time!

text.jpText: Light up! 未来へとKIRAめけ イルミネイション
text.enText: Light up! The future with a sparkling illumination

text.jpText: 世界をドレスアップ Colorful wonderland
text.enText: The whole world is all dressed up, It's a Colorful wonderland

text.jpText: Enjoy! 粉雪が手渡す とっておきの Greeting
text.enText: Enjoy! The lovely powdered snow in your hands, It's a special Greeting

text.jpText: さあ まだまだ走ろう 先へ
text.enText: Come on, let's keep running and running further ahead

text.jpText: Let's party all night!
text.enText: Let's party all night!

text.jpText: Light up! 未来へとKIRAめけ イルミネイション
text.enText: Light up! The future with a sparkling illumination

text.jpText: 世界をドレスアップ Colorful wonderland
text.enText: The whole world is all dressed up, It's a Colorful wonderland

text.jpText: Enjoy! 降り積もるキセキは 祝福の Fragment
text.enText: Enjoy! These falling miracles around us, they're a blessed Fragment

text.jpText: さあ まだまだ走ろう キミと
text.enText: Come on, we'll keep running and run together with you

text.jpText: Let's party all night!
text.enText: Let's party all night!

text.jpText: Let's party all night!
text.enText: Let's party all night!
